data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Churkin, Sergei V., Kolesnichenko, Kirill A. (2019): A new subspecies of Glabroculus elvira (Eversmann, 1854) (Lepidoptera, Lycaenidae) from the Dzhungarian Gobi desert, Mongolia. Zootaxa 4555 (4): 581-587, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4555.4.9|22 occurrences
